events.name: Arizona State Sun Devils at Duke Blue Devils

headlines.description: Arizona State beats Duke 36-31 in Sun Bowl
headlines.shortLinkText: ASU staves off Duke in Sun Bowl

headlines.description: Adoree' Jackson scored on a 98-yard kickoff return and a 71-yard pass from Cody Kessler, and No. 24 Southern California blew most of an 18-point, third-quarter lead before beating Nebraska 45-42 in the Holiday Bowl on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: USC holds off Huskers for wild win

events.name: Cincinnati Bearcats at Virginia Tech Hokies

notes.headline: MILITARY BOWL PRESENTED BY NORTHROP GRUMMAN

headlines.description: J.C. Coleman ran for 157 yards and a touchdown, and Virginia Tech harassed and ultimately injured Cincinnati quarterback Gunner Kiel while rolling to a 33-17 victory Saturday in the Military Bowl.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Military Bowl: Cincinnati-VA Tech) 2014/12/27 ESHEET

headlines.shortLinkText: Hokies win Military Bowl; Kiel hurt

events.name: Miami Hurricanes at South Carolina Gamecocks

headlines.description: Dylan Thompson threw for 284 yards and two touchdowns and ran for another score in South Carolina's 24-21 victory over Miami on Saturday in the Duck Commander Independence Bowl.

events.name: Boston College Eagles at Penn State Nittany Lions

headlines.description: NEW YORK -- Christian Hackenberg hit Kyle Carter for a 10-yard touchdown pass in overtime and Penn State kicked the extra point that Boston College could not, lifting the Nittany Lions to a 31-30 win in the New Era Pinstripe Bowl on Saturday night.

video.headline: Franklin Reflects On Team's OT Bowl Win

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Interview (Franklin Reflects On Team's OT Bowl Win) 2014/12/27 Wrap

headlines.shortLinkText: PSU wins in first post-Sandusky bowl
